articles.title: 'If not now, when?': Emotional Australian PM advances Indigenous referendum - Reuters
articles.description: Australia took a step on Thursday towards a historical referendum to give Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders recognition in the constitution and, for the first time, a voice on matters that affect their lives.
articles.content: SYDNEY, March 23 (Reuters) - Australia took a step on Thursday towards a historical referendum to give Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders recognition in the constitution and, for the first time, … [+3553 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Virat Kohli deliberately collides with Stoinis, Australia star reacts - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The videos of the Kohli-Stoinis' friendly and intentional collision went viral on social media. | Cricket
articles.content: Virat Kohli, in a recent interaction with AB de Villiers, said that his equation with the Australian cricketers have changed for the better over the past few years. There were multiple proofs of that… [+3573 chars]
